coreAtributes.authorTag: "Tailored by the DSG Textile Guild" is crudely sewn into the fabric near the side seam
coreAtributes.name: roughspun tunic
coreAtributes.description: A tunic made from roughspun wool, cinched about the waist with a leather belt. Although it reaches down to the wearer's thighs, movement is not impeded thanks to partial slits cut into the sides. A small pouch is attached to the belt for handy storage. The fabric is threadbare despite still being whole.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] on the tunic. [npc.She] then securely [npc.verb(fasten)] the belt around [npc.namePos] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the tunic's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso. [npc.She] then securely [npc.verb(fasten)] the belt around [npc2.namePos] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms into the tunic's sleeves as [npc.she] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(yanks)] the belt around [npc2.namePos] waist and [npc.verb(cinch)] it up as tightly as possible.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(undo)] the belt around [npc.namePos] waist and [npc.verb(pull)] off [npc.her] tunic.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(undo)] the belt around [npc2.namePos] waist [npc.verb(pull)] off [npc2.her] tunic.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(undo)] the belt around [npc2.namePos] waist, then [npc.verb(grab)] hold of [npc2.namePos] tunic and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] it off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] tunic back down over [npc.her] torso and securely [npc.verb(fasten)] the belt around [npc.namePos] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] tunic back down over [npc2.her] torso and securely [npc2.verb(fasten)] the belt around [npc2.namePos] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] tunic back down over [npc2.her] torso before yanking the belt around [npc2.namePos] waist and cinching it up as tightly as possible.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(undo)] the belt around [npc.namePos] waist and [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] tunic up to just below [npc.her] chin.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(undo)] the belt around [npc2.namePos] waist and [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] tunic up to just below [npc2.her] chin.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(undo)] the belt around [npc2.namePos] waist and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] tunic up to just below [npc2.her] chin.
